page.title: 16CRAIGINCHES PRISON
page.content: Craiginches prison was built in 1890 for 36 thousand pounds.this security prison overlooks the river Dee and was situated here because 100 years ago it was outside the town of Aberdeen.The electric gate ,toilet block educational unit and modernised cookhouse are the most recent changes There can be a maximum of 174 prisiners,can earn money by mending fishing nets or machine knitting pullovers .All maintinence work is carried out by staff and prisoners .the condemed cell still exists but was last used in 1965 there are at present six prisoners serving life senteces but the majority of men are serving short sentences from seven days to 18 months. convicted prisoners may be visited for 30 minutes fortnightly.Recently drug related offences are a growing problem
